p: A different result was observed using ABTS radical cation. In fact, in this test fresh H. lucida subsp. taurina leaves (HT1) showed a comparable radical scavenging activity to that reported for ascorbic acid (IC 50 = 1.8 and 1.7 μg/mL, respectively). A promising ABTS radical scavenging potential was noted with the blanching water from the blanching of the leaves of the same species (HT3, IC 50 = 2.9 μg/mL).
